I updated form Tomcat 7.0.40 to Tomcat 7.0.75 and my application crashes with null pointer exception because the injected objects are not being initialized. The objects are declared as @Named and @ApplicationScoped. They also contains a @PostConstruct init() method - not called either.

This behavior only occurs with the new Tomcat.
creator: andra.roman@ymail.com
markt@apache.org
text: Neither @Named nor @ApplicationScoped are annotations that Tomcat recognises. You'll need to contact the support channel for whatever component provides them.
